downloader.object

Class Setting

  • java.lang.Object
    • downloader.object.Setting

  • public class Setting
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with only static variable and static functions. Storing current setting and change current setting. When program starts the setting will be loaded ( if failed , set default setting ), and save setting before program ends.
    Author:
    Moon

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultSetting

        public static void setDefaultSetting()
        Sets default setting for program. UI: SystemLookAndFeel DefaultPath: C:\\Users\\Moon\\Desktop\\New Folder Connection test time : 10 Port number: 8888 Start Request Listener When Starts : true; Start Tasks When Starts : false;

      • saveSetting

        public static void saveSetting()
        Saves current setting to file "config.dat".

      • loadSetting

        public static void loadSetting()
        Loads file "config.dat" to current setting. If "config.dat" does not exist , set default setting.

      • getTestTime

        public static int getTestTime()
        Gets connection test times number which means how many times program will try while encountering connection failure.
        Returns:
        test times number.

      • setTestTime

        public static void setTestTime(int time)
        Sets connection test times number.
        Parameters:
        time - : test times number set by user.

      • getDefaultPath

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultPath()
        Gets current path which is set automatically in the new task frame.
        Returns:
        current default path.

      • setDefaultPath

        public static void setDefaultPath(java.lang.String path)
        Sets default path.
        Parameters:
        path - file path set by user

      • getDefaultLookAndFeel

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultLookAndFeel()
        Gets current UI
        Returns:
        Current UI of setting.

      • setDefaultLookAndFeel

        public static void setDefaultLookAndFeel(java.lang.String laf)
        Sets default UI
        Parameters:
        laf - The LookAndFeel to be set
